items.sentence: Can I have the paper when you\'re finished with it?
I didn\'t like Tom at all the first time I met him.
I don\'t need your money. What I need is your time.
Did you ever stop to think about what might happen?
Even Tom is a little interested in learning French.
She made it plain that she wanted to go to college.
She went to see him while he was staying in Boston.
The last time I saw Tom he was as drunk as a skunk.
The last time I saw Tom he was walking on crutches.
I don\'t think Tom and Mary are brother and sister.
I don\'t think Tom has very many friends in Boston.
I don\'t think Tom knows where Mary parked her car.
I don\'t think Tom understood what he needed to do.
I don\'t think Tom wants to go to Boston with Mary.
Tom could hardly make himself understood in French.
Tom could have done better if he had had more time.
Tom could see that Mary was on the verge of crying.
Tom could tell right away that Mary was in trouble.
Tell Tom I need to talk to him as soon as possible.
The South Pole is a lot colder than the North Pole.
Tom can\'t put up with Mary\'s behavior any longer.
Tom hasn\'t been to the supermarket in a long time.
Tom hasn\'t even started studying for the exam yet.
I want you to say you\'re not going back to Boston.
I wanted to make sure we didn\'t cause the problem.
Tom and Mary aren\'t talking to each other anymore.
If you go to the movies, take your sister with you.
I haven\'t yet read the book you\'re talking about.
You must consider what kind of work you want to do.
Were you going to the train station when I saw you?
What kind of costumes did you buy for the children?
What should I do to find a suitable job for myself?
What you say is more important than how you say it.
If you are by my side, I don\'t need anything else.
Tom was sitting alone in the dark waiting for Mary.
Tom was sitting at home in his pajamas watching TV.
Tom was sitting in the living room folding laundry.
Tom was trying to defuse the bomb when it exploded.
Tom was watching what was happening very carefully.
Tom was worried that his cat would never come back.
Tom dog paddled toward the shallow end of the pool.
Tom emailed Mary the pictures he took at her party.
Tom entered the office carrying an armload of mail.
Don\'t think I don\'t appreciate what you\'ve done.
Tom didn\'t have the courage to try doing it again.
Tom didn\'t know what kind of snake had bitten him.
Tom doesn\'t know how to relax and just enjoy life.
That\'s not worth the price they\'re asking for it.
The money we offered them was obviously not enough.
Tom says he\'s gotten used to eating hospital food.
